# Venv Instructions

## Instructions

- Always use the project-local virtual environment binary `venv/bin/python` instead of the system `python` or `python3` command.
- For running scripts: `venv/bin/python script.py`
- For installing packages: `venv/bin/pip install <package>`
- For running modules: `venv/bin/python -m <module>`
- For running tests: `venv/bin/python -m pytest`
